metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24331 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - negligible
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in TrouSerS through 0.3.14. If the tcsd daemon isstarted with root privileges, the tss user still has read and write accessto the /etc/tcsd.conf file (which contains various settings related to thisdaemon).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24331` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtspi1 - 0.3.15-0.3
trousers - 0.3.15-0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: trousers package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.15-0.3').
